channel.title: Comments on: Getting the Most out of Bible Software

item.title: By: Jim Barr
item.dc:creator: Jim Barr
item.description:
Bob, The PC vs Mac platform issue is becoming less and less an issue. Accordance is a great program, but BibleWorks has many very satisfied users who run it on a Mac. Check out:
http://www.bibleworks.com/content/sys-req.html
item.content:encoded:
Bob,
The PC vs Mac platform issue is becoming less and less an issue. Accordance is a great program, but BibleWorks has many very satisfied users who run it on a Mac. Check out:

http://www.bibleworks.com/content/sys-req.html

item.title: By: Bob Gonzales
item.dc:creator: Bob Gonzales
item.description:
I'm disappointed Bibleworks hasn't developed a Mac version. So I'm switching to Accordance. Anyone interested in purchasing my Bibleworks 7?
Bob Gonzales rgonz985@gmail.com
item.content:encoded:
I’m disappointed Bibleworks hasn’t developed a Mac version. So I’m switching to Accordance. Anyone interested in purchasing my Bibleworks 7?

Bob Gonzales
rgonz985@gmail.com
